name: sys_common::wstr::WStrUnits::<'_>::new

core::ops::ControlFlow: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 13031, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4690, name: "core::ptr::NonNull" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 1225, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U16)) })]))) })])

doc:
Creates the iterator. Returns `None` if `lpwstr` is null.

 SAFETY: `lpwstr` must point to a null-terminated wide string that lives
 at least as long as the lifetime of this struct.
